title: What are the benefits of content writing for websites? - Quora

response.answer_text: The benefits of content writing for websites are the same as the benefits of having a website. Can’t really separate the two, as a website is essentially pieces of content - written, graphics, images, vids - put together to form an online presence. Written content is your best shot at communicating to your audience what you are all about. As others mentioned in their answers, written content holds also tangible benefits such as link building, SEO and driving traffic to your website - all these important. But at its core content, like speaking, is meant for communication. So the benefit is allowing your audience to get to know you.

There is always a term called "competition " whenever you step into the market with your product or business idea, this competition prevails every time you try to give this world something new. The idea is to strengthen your business studies in a way that they can stand in the competition and can make its own identity, for this purpose you have to take help of content marketing. There are a lot of ways in which it helps you build your business. · Branding of your product. To sell a product you need to give the buyers a satisfactory content about it so that he can get fascinated towards it, the better the content the better will be branding. · Building trust. Content marketing helps in building trust between the customers and the company. · Increases communication. Content marketing helps in setting up a communication between the customers and the company. · Boosts your website ranking. Content marketing is one such method which helps in driving traffic to your site. The unique and better the content the more will be the visitors. · Easy for customers to understand your product. Contents help the visitors of your site to properly understand your product; it helps them in understanding all the aspects of it. · Least expensive This method of marketing is a least expensive one, it takes minimum investments. · Quick method. Contents are something which takes very less time for generation and can be launched as soon as they are completed without any hindrance. · Facile. Content marketing is easy to do and it is also the most effective in this digital world. · Broad spectrum. There is no foundation when it comes to content marketing as they can be generated for almost everything. · No losses. This type of marketing has no losses as these contents prevail for long until the time you want to change them. So the conclusion from above points indicates that content marketing is best for today's competitive world.
